info.title: Fluxer API
info.description: API for Fluxer, a free and open source instant messaging and VoIP platform built for friends, groups, and communities.

short.description: Whether the field should be displayed as a short column

footer.description: Footer text displayed at the bottom

ts.description: Unix timestamp for the attachment footer

author_link.description: URL to link from the author name

author_icon.description: URL for the author icon image

image_url.description: URL of the main image to display

botToken.name: Authorization
botToken.description: Bot token: `Authorization: Bot <token>`. This is the primary authentication method for bot applications.

scopes.guilds: Read guild membership information for the current user.
scopes.connections: Read linked third-party account connections for the current user.
scopes.bot: Add a bot user to a guild.
scopes.admin: Access admin endpoints when the user has admin ACLs.

bearerToken.description: Bearer-form token: `Authorization: Bearer <token>`. Use `oauth2Token` when a route requires OAuth2 scopes.

sessionToken.name: Authorization
sessionToken.description: User session token from login: `Authorization: <token>` (no prefix). Prefer a bot account over user tokens where possible.

adminApiKey.name: Authorization
adminApiKey.description: Admin API key: `Authorization: Admin <token>`. Only valid for `/admin/*` endpoints.

tags.name: Billing
tags.description: Subscription and payment management via Stripe
